sentences.cn: 文静而善于思考的男子

sentences.en: All surfaces are provided with highly reflective coatings.
sentences.cn: 所有表面上均涂一层高反射膜.

sentences.en: Alternatively, a reflective type of adhesive containing aluminium powder may be used.
sentences.cn: 此外, 也可采用含有铝粉的反射型粘接剂.

sentences.en: An electronic apparatus and a reflective mirror module are also provided.
sentences.cn: 一种电子装置及反射镜槽块亦被提出.

sentences.en: Avoid pans with a shiny, reflective base as the heat will be reflected back.
sentences.cn: 不要使用锅底光亮、能反射热的平底锅，因为热量会被反射回去。

sentences.en: Glass deep processing: production of anti - reflective coating Ninglu glass and insulating glass.
sentences.cn: 玻璃深加工: 生产热反射镀膜防凝露玻璃、中空玻璃.

sentences.en: HORSE: This will be a reflective year for you, Horse.
sentences.cn: 这一年对于属马的朋友来说是深思熟虑的一年.

sentences.en: I walked on in a reflective mood to the car.
sentences.cn: 我心事重重地向车子走去。

sentences.en: In this paper, a reflective infrared sensors to control the tap.
sentences.cn: 本文主要采用了反射式红外线传感器来控制水龙头.

sentences.en: Light streaks on surface of flow are traces of highly reflective flakes.
sentences.cn: 流动表面上的亮条纹是高度反光的薄片的轨迹线.

sentences.en: Recently, my thoughts have taken me on a number of self - reflective journeys.
sentences.cn: 最近我好几次反思这一段历程.

sentences.en: She was in a reflective mood.
Stick reflective tape on your school bag.
sentences.cn: 给你的书包贴上反光带。

sentences.en: The contribution entitles you to a reflective decal.
sentences.cn: 因为你的捐助我们授予你这个闪光的标签.

sentences.en: The saddles feature a reflective trim for night time visibility.
sentences.cn: 这些车座的特点是带有在夜间可视的反光镶边。

sentences.en: These comments by Joy and Lester were reflective of the general attitude.
sentences.cn: 乔伊和莱斯特的这些评论反映了普遍的态度.

sentences.en: Yuba factory production specifications for a variety of reflective light bulbs.
sentences.cn: 本厂生产多种规格浴霸专用反射灯泡.

words.tran_cn: [物] 反射率；[光] 反射性；反射比
[光] 反射物，[光] 反射镜
反射；思考（reflect的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 反射的，反映的，反省性的，（指人、心情等）深思熟虑的，（指物体表面）反光的
